group2_max_flat_shipping_cost = #{group2MaxFlatShippingCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
group3_max_flat_shipping_cost = #{group3MaxFlatShippingCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
handling_time_enabled = #{handlingTimeEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
home_page_featured_enabled = #{homePageFeaturedEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
in_escrow_workflow_timeline = #{inEscrowWorkflowTimeline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isbn_enabled = #{isbnEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_compatibility_enabled = #{itemCompatibilityEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_compatibility_type = #{itemCompatibilityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_specifics_enabled = #{itemSpecificsEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
listing_duration = #{listingDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_flat_shipping_cost = #{maxFlatShippingCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
max_granular_fitment_count = #{maxGranularFitmentCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_item_compatibility = #{minItemCompatibility,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_item_compatibility = #{maxItemCompatibility,jdbcType=INTEGER},

non_subscription = #{nonSubscription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paisa_pay_full_escrow_enabled = #{paisaPayFullEscrowEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
paypal_buyer_protection_enabled = #{paypalBuyerProtectionEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
paypal_required = #{paypalRequired,jdbcType=BIT},
payment_methoed = #{paymentMethoed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_profile_category_group = #{paymentProfileCategoryGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickup_drop_off_enabled = #{pickupDropOffEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
premium_subscription = #{premiumSubscription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_pack_enabled = #{proPackEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
pro_pack_plus_enabled = #{proPackPlusEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
product_creation_enabled = #{productCreationEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

return_policy_profile_category_group = #{returnPolicyProfileCategoryGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

revise_quantity_allowed = #{reviseQuantityAllowed,jdbcType=BIT},

vin_supported = #{vinSupported,jdbcType=BIT},
vrm_supported = #{vrmSupported,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
